alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 03 at 5:25AM MST until December 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...The Northern Front Range Foothills, and The Southern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...Winds will increase again today. The greatest threat of high winds is in the late afternoon and evening in areas above 7500 feet and in the lower foothills west of Boulder and Denver. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
